name: Vanguard Spec
desc: Further enhances Gale Thrust. Casting Gale Thrust grants a fixed 20% chance to cause Basic Attacks to evolve into Swift Blade, with an additional 5% chance per layer of Sharpness.

name: Break Pursuit Advancement
desc: Within 15s after Casting the Ultimate, Casting Breach Pursuit will not enter CD. This effect is removed after the time ends or after Casting 3 times Breach Pursuit.

name: Quickshot Meteor
desc:
Gale Thrust is enhanced, increasing hit counts by 2.
Reduces Gale Thrust's Courage consumption by 20%.

name: Swift Breeze
desc: Each 1% Haste accelerates the REG SPD of Courage by 2%.

name: Strong Attack
desc: When Valor Cyclone deals DMG, reduces the CD of Ultimate by 0.5s (which can only be triggers once on multiple hits).

name: Wind Tear
desc: When Gale Thrust deals DMG, there is a 20% fixed chance to apply Rend.

name: Wind Chaser
desc: During the casting of Valor Cyclone, for every 20 points of Courage consumed, increase the DMG of Valor Cyclone by 4%, up to 20%.

name: Battle Cry
desc:
Typhoon Cleave Raises the banner spear, granting Inspire to Allies. Afterward, a follow-up leap can be launched, dealing Attack Damage to the enemies within range and knocking them airborne, while restoring 100 Courage.
Inspire: Lasts for 10s. All Allies gain 10% Haste (Only one effect can be active at a time). You restore 10 Courage per second and 1 Sharpness every 2s.

name: Zephyr Waltz Agility
desc: Additional Courage recovery: Recovers 1 extra point of Courage per second for every 2 stacks of Sharp.

name: Fearless Gale
desc: After Casting Spiral Thrust or Breach Pursuit or Valor Cyclone, the next Gale Thrust will not consume Courage. This effect is removed after leaving combat.

name: Vigor Spike
desc: When Sharp is granted, reaching max stacks of Sharp enables Vigor Spike state. Triggers up to once per 30s.

name: Combat Expertise
desc: You gain bonus ATK continuously as the battle goes on. Every 15s in battle increases your ATK by 2%, up to 8%. The bonus is cleared after the battle ends.

name: Rapid Drake Canon
desc: Using Swift Blade grants it a fixed 10% chance to evolve Basic Attack into Drake Cannon in 10s. Each failure to evolve increases the chance by 10% until success.

name: Catcher
desc: In combat, for every enemy defeated that you participated in defeating (effective within a team), increases ATK by 30 for 30s, up to 300.

name: Wind Spiral
desc:
When Gale Thrust deals DMG, it has a 25% fixed chance to grant 1 stack of Wind Spiral that lasts 20s and stacks up to 10 times.
Wind Spiral: Casting Spiral Thrust or Valor Cyclone triggers a spiral explosion that inflicts Attack Damage equal to 100% ATK on surrounding enemies. Each explosion consumes 1 stack of Wind Spiral.

name: Spiral Tear
desc: Spiral Thrust and Vortex Strike deals 30% more DMG to the targets with Rend.

name: Whispering Breeze
desc:
When Courage is below or equal to 50%, reduces the Energy Valor Cyclone consumes by 2.
When Courage is above 50%, increases the DMG Valor Cyclone deals by 12%.

name: Breath of Wind
desc: Skills that consume Courage (Spiral Thrust and its enhanced skills, Valor Cyclone, Falcon Toss and its enhanced skills, Gale Thrust) gain 6% Wind Bonus.

name: Wind Rift Diffusion
desc: Expertise and Ultimates deal 10% more DMG to targets afflicted with Rend, and can detonate their Rend, spreading it to nearby enemies.

name: Thousand Wounds
desc: When Valor Cyclone deals DMG, it has a fixed 50% chance to inflict Rupture.

name: Momentum Surge
desc: Enhances Sharpness by 1%. Every enemy within 5 meters additionally grants 1%, up to 3%.

name: Wind Split Technique
desc: When Rend deals DMG, it has a fixed 50% chance to grant 2 points of Courage.

name: Vortex Strike
desc: After every 2 casts of Drake Cannon, your Spiral Thrust evolves into Vortex Strike.

name: Wind Gate Drake Cannon
desc: Every 22 triggers of Valor Cyclone allows Basic Attack to evolve into Drake Cannon in 10s.

name: Swift Blade
desc: When Valor Cyclone deals DMG, it has a fixed 7% chance to evolve Basic Attacks into Swift Blade.

name: Dragon's Fury Flame
desc:
Doubles the critical rate of Drake Cannon and Vortex Strike.
Increases the Crit DMG dealt by Drake Cannon and Vortex Strike by 8%.

name: Spiral Flame
desc: Using Vortext Strike, increases Haste by 25% for 10s.

name: Fortitude
desc:
During Valor Cyclone, gains Super Armor and reduces DMG taken by 20%.
When Valor Cyclone deals DMG, restores HP equal to 10% ATK.

name: Wind Rise
desc: When Valor Cyclone deals DMG, increases the critical rate of Drake Cannon and Vortex Strike by 7%. The effect lasts 5s and stacks up to 7 times.
